templates.name: Initial Discovery
questions: What is your current financial situation and income?
What are your short-term financial goals (next 1-3 years)?
What are your long-term financial goals (5+ years)?
Do you have any outstanding debts or liabilities?
What is your current risk tolerance?
Do you have an emergency fund in place?
What insurance policies do you currently hold?
Are there any major life events coming up (marriage, children, retirement)?

templates.name: Portfolio Review
questions: How do you feel about your portfolio's performance this quarter?
Have your financial goals or timeline changed since our last meeting?
Are there any holdings you'd like to increase or reduce exposure to?
Has your risk tolerance changed given recent market conditions?
Do you have any upcoming liquidity needs?
Would you like to explore any new asset classes or sectors?
Are you happy with the current income yield from your portfolio?
Do you want to review the fee structure on any of your funds?

templates.name: Follow-Up
questions: Have you had a chance to review the documents we sent?
Do you have any questions about the recommendations from last time?
Have you completed the action items from our previous meeting?
Has anything changed in your personal or financial situation?
Are you comfortable with the next steps we discussed?
Is there anything else you'd like to address today?
